name: "DIVYA RASA" (Centre for Healing, Learning, Research and Communication)

address: Divya Rasa - Temple of Love, Su Kilnachipattu
Then Mathur post, near Arunai Engineering college

briefDescription: Divya Rasa is an NGO dedicated to serve autistic individuals and their peer groups. As of now we are daily taking care of 12 autistic adolescents and supporting their families. The services we render are free of cost, as per the core value of selfless service and unconditional love.

address: No: 20, Chinnaya New Colony, 2nd Cross Street, Perambur, Chennai
